isis.stitle: FRONT NON-DRIVE STEERING AXLE: ROCKWELL - CLEAN AND INSPECT - PREVENTING CORROSION AND RUST ON CLEANED PARTS

svcproc.title: PREVENTING CORROSION AND RUST ON CLEANED PARTS
svcproc.para: Apply a light oil to cleaned and dried parts that are not damaged and are to be immediately assembled. Do notapply oil to the brake linings or the brake drums.

If parts are to be stored, apply a good rust preventative to all surfaces. Do not apply the material to brake linings or brake drums. Store the parts inside special paper or other material that prevents corrosion rust.
